head: Pet Friendly  Great Location  Central Air/Heat
post: The Bassett-Davis Apartments are a clean, well maintained complex near major electronic and high tech industries. This ground floor remodeled 1BR/1BA apartment features a living room, dining area, kitchen, master bedroom, and a full bath. Your apartment is quieter than normal since there is no one above or below you and the apartment has extensive soundproofing. Your new home features desirable central heat and air conditioning. At the Bassett Davis apartments, the resident pays landlord for gas and electricity (currently $67/per month). Landlord pays for normal water and garbage collection. This means that resident will pay to landlord the following: $1,360 - rent $1,427 - Total paid to Landlord each month. Resident will The 1 story design is extremely convenient since parking is very close to the unit and there no stairs to climb to get to your home. The Bassett-Davis Apartments are a dog and cat friendly building. (Each potential new animal will be interviewed by the manager. [Breed Restricted]) To set an appointment to see the Bassett-Davis Apartments, please call Evon at If no one is available to answer the phone, PLEASE leave a message and someone WILL call you back. head: Lovely 1 bed 1 bath in LPH
post: Lovely 1 bedroom, 1 bath condominium in a gorgeous 1920 Edwardian-style building. This bright home offers approximately 768 sq. ft. (per tax records), a recently updated bathroom, stainless steel counter tops and appliances, 9-foot ceilings, and a large walk-in closet. There are hardwood floors throughout, new dual pane windows, and an in-unit storage area. This charming building consists of 21 units, with a common laundry area, bike storage, and a rooftop deck with attractive views. Conveniently located in Lower Pacific Heights, this home has a Walk Score of 97. This is the perfect location, putting everything San Francisco has to offer at your fingertips: truly an urban dwellers dream.

head: three BR, two bathroom stunning home
SOMA Grand Residence
post: SOMA Grand Residence #607 is a luxury 2 bedroom, 2 bath corner home with panoramic downtown views through floor-to-ceiling windows. This bright, spacious, and open floor plan is nicely appointed with upgraded hardwood floors, Bosch stainless steel appliances, Studio Becker cabinetry, CaesarStone countertops and breakfast bar, and custom window coverings. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet, and there are dual sinks in the en-suite master bath. The 2nd bedroom also has downtown views and easily doubles as a home office. The 5th floor garden level features a full fitness center, hot tub, sun deck with cabanas, yoga studio, meditation garden, fire pit, barbecue area with picnic bench seating, and a club room with chefs kitchen and plasma TV. On the ground floor is Heavens Dog, a restaurant and noodle shop by Charles Phan of Slanted Door.

head: 3br - 2200ft˛ - Furnished newer  2236 Marsh Rd Santa Rosa, CA 95403
post: Have the best of both worlds. It is like the country in the city! Single level with no 2 level houses in neighborhood of low density homes. Newer designer furniture and accessories included 2002 built extra sturdy. 3 huge bedrooms/2 baths with large 2 car garage. This portion of Santa Rosa-homes have acreage-this home has 1/2 acre that shares with a granny. The granny may be also available-(together or separately) Feels like the country, is quiet and peaceful, but is 1 mile to Safeway. Every upgrade you can think of-$50k worth! 9 ceilings, except cathedral in formal living room. Formal dining room. Crown molding throughout and entry has floor to ceiling pillars. Used to be a 4 bedroom, but I took the bedroom closest to the master and turned it into a very large Master with a gigantic walk in closet with sit down vanity. Master bath has Corian double sinks, travertine floors, a 6 whirlpool bath and a double head ex. large master shower. Kitchen is an enormous great room with family room. Large Granite island with room for 4 stools, island has the sink. Italian tile on rest of counter tops with custom cabinets, cabinet dishwasher and refrigerator. 2 convection ovens - one with regular oven, the other with microwave and gas cook top. Custom fireplace in family room. along with plantation shutters and hardwood floors. Washer and dryer are next to bedrooms. Extra large closets in all rooms, coat closet and 3 linen closets. Extra insulation along with heating and cooling in zones with 2 thermostats for small PGE bills. Central heating and air conditioning. No one has ever rented this home and it is in perfect condition.

Absolutely YES Pets, No Section 8, No Smokers, Credit Check Required. Good credit a must. $1500/mo

head: 2 bed&2 bathroom apt low price
post: Hello future roommate! A beautiful 2nd-floor, bright, spacious 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom apt located in Sunnyvale (wolf & El Camino Real. Very convenient to hwy 101,280 and 85 ) great area. Available starting from July 15, 2013 2 bedroom a bathroom apt about 960 square ft, master room for rent, your own private bath room inside.(have show no bathtub) walking closet. bedroom living room, balcony, kitchen all remodel. Free water,garbage, cable TV. Rent $900 + (electricity and internet). A little more about me. Asian, F , professional, easygoing clean, prefers a quiet. like travel, most weekends you can find me enjoying the outdoors and exploring the surrounding area. I am looking for an open minded, social, easy person whos going to do his/her share to upkeep of the place. Clean and respectful of shared space.That means clean up after yourself, Im not a morning person at all, so I prefer someone who doesnt have an early morning schedule. Light cooking is preferred, I am looking for someone who can eventually become a friend and not be a stranger in the house. Couple is OK.(pay a little more $50.) Restrictions: No smoking, no drugs, and no heavy alcohol users, no sociopaths, no drama :). Familly/friend visitors and partners of any gender/orientation are OK, but no over night. Apt need application and check credit fee $25. Deposit $600. 6 Months Lease & Longer preferred Tell me a bit about yourself, and your terms (job situation, move in date, needs, expectations, etc.) your phone number Thanks.

head: Townhouse Apartment JC Area
post: Hello Fellow Craigslisters, I am renting a room/shared living space in Downtown Santa Rosa about 4 blocks away from the JC Area and about 5 minutes away from Downtown 4th St. Great for College Students or Downtown Santa Rosa living. Shared living space will be a available before the next semester. I am renting a Large 15 x 10 ft room upstairs and a shared space in my townhouse/apartment. Built in closets with tall shelfs have lots of shelf space and storage. Vaulted ceilings makes the rooms in the apartment seem larger upstairs. Downstairs there is a front room for a roommates own down space and stuff. Their is a separate vanity inside the bathroom for a roommate. Tub and Toilet shared. Kitchen is shared. ( I am a clean person so their has never been a problem. ) Small front and back patio. Small kitchen that divides the two living rooms downstairs. Bedroom available is upstairs facing the courtyard below. Water and Garbage Included. Wifi & PGE is shared. Sorry no additional animals or dogs. :@( Rent is $600 per month. Rent is month to month basis. Deposit is required. *** I am looking for someone who has a stable income. Has a invested interest where they live and likes peace and harmonious atmosphere. Please have past renting addresses ready and references. *** Please NO PARTY ANIMALS OR DRUGGIES OR PYSCHO DRUNKS! BEAWARE ABSULUTLY NO PARTIES...LANDLORD LIVES ON SITE. Outside the House smoking & 420 are okay. About me: I am a 26 year old lady. Very active and loves my home! Open minded and non discriminative towards life style or sexual orientation. I am very clean and easygoing person. I work as musician and engineer. I am currently in my last years of schooling. I am very stable and like a peaceful home life. I pay my bills on time and for the most part really live well with all types of people. I am taking inquires,contact information,references and doing interviews. All of this end of this month of June into Mid July. I will be showing the space in July. The space will be available in August 1st. I will be doing phone interviews first and then a face to face. Sorry First come first serve. The objective is to have this roommate position filled ASAP. Their is a new property manager here and maintenance of my apartment should be going on. Which is a bonus for everyone! Thanks for your interest and I look forward to finding a new roommate! Drop me a email for any questions or to set up a phone interview. After a interview via phone your welcome to come check the place out. Please leave a email with at least your number/name/ and best time to reach you. Thanks for the interest & Happy Summer everyone!!

head: Like a Single Family Home - Ready to Move In.
post: Property Features: - Huge one bed/one bath duplex in the beautiful single family neighborhood - Private yard with fruit trees & BBQ area, plenty of storage room, no sharing wall with any neighbors - Nicely remodeled and ready to move in - All double pane windows, new blinds, new entry door, re-faced kitchen cabinets & all closets, new interior paint, beautiful hardwood floor, new sparkly lights and more - One block from Castro St. - Steps to shopping, fine dinning, Performance Art Center, Downtown Mountain View, etc. - Minutes to schools, library, parks, Google, Facebook, NASA, Yahoo!, Apple, Stanford University, etc. - Easy access to Buses, Light Rail, Cal Train, Central EXWY, HWY 101 & 85, etc. Lease Details: - Verification on personal credit, rental history, employment & income - 12 month lease for the first term & month-to-month after one year - Monthly rent: $1850 (Water & Garbage included) - Security deposit: $2000 - No Smokers - No Pets - Open House: Sat 9-11am & Sun 3-5pm - Address: 149B Santa Clara Ave. Mountain View, CA 94043
